name: The Nelson Provincial Museum
openingHours: DEL Museo: Ciudad Acre 445, Nelson lunes a viernes 10:00-17:00 10:00-16:30 los fines de semana centro de investigaci√≥n: Parque Isel, alimenta 12:30 a 16:30 del martes al viernes, previa cita.

offers.description:
THE MUSEUM: Town Acre 445, Nelson
Admission to regional history gallery is free for Nelson Tasman ratepayers. Visitng adults $7, children $3, families $20max. Admission charges may apply to temporary exhibitions.

RESEARCH FACILITY: Isel Park, Stoke
Admission donations are appreciated. Research and reproduction fees may apply.
